definitions.definition: Where ever ; an emphatic form of where .
examples: Wherever have you been all my life?

definitions.definition: In, at or to any place that one likes or chooses.
examples: I don't care what you do with it; just put it wherever .
Where do you want to have lunch? — Wherever ; I don't mind.

definitions.definition: The place (no matter where) in, at or to which.
examples: He's back from wherever he's been hiding.
Go home to wherever you belong.
I'd you follow me wherever you went.

main_definition: ( interrogative ) Where ever ; an emphatic form of where .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) In, at or to any place that one likes or chooses.
( fused relative ) The place (no matter where) in, at or to which.
